column4: Jordan, in UNetbootin, what do I choose to install edubuntu 10.10?  They have several options for ubuntu 10.10 but nothing for edubuntu
In UNetbootin, what do I choose to install edubuntu 10.10?  They have several options for ubuntu 10.10 but nothing for edubuntu
have you already dowbnloaded the isO?
if you've already downloaded it.. click the option below.. and use the button beside it to navigate to the ISO you downloaded
